title: Connect 4
subline: A local two player game. Play with your friends or against your enemies.
description: This project is a modern rendition of the classic 80ies game. The upside is, you don't have to pick up any pices of the floor and can't lose any of them. On a technical note, this was realized with jQuery...

title: Picture Carousel
subline: Kitty picture carousel, easily customized for dogs too!
description: A standard picture carousel as comonly used on websites where different pictures share the hero position. Watch all pictures animate on and of or select a specific picture to be displayed.

title: News Ticker animation
description: This mini demo lets a preselected collection of news headlines scroll through ad infinitum. Remeber when the web was full of these? You know how trends work, prepare for the ticker's comeback!

title: Spotify Search -
subline: Ever wanted to search spotify but NOT USE spotify? It's now possible!
description: Spotify's powerful API allows us to send search querries directly to them and render the results on our own website. Why is this useful? Well, you tell me!
